DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective study aim assess treatment pattern within 1 year initiate BPH treatment , include 5-alpha-reductase inhibitor ( 5ARI ) monotherapy , alpha-blocker ( AB ) monotherapy , early combination therapy , delay combination therapy . The MarketScan database utilized study ( 2000-2008 )
DOC.brief_title: Benign Prostatic Hypertrophy Treatment Patterns & Outcomes : Marketscan
DOC.criteria: Male age 50 year older diagnostic claim BPH least one prescription claim 5ARI AB enrollment period continuous eligibility 6 month prior 12 month index prescription date diagnosis prostate bladder cancer study period prostaterelated surgical procedure within 1 month index prescription date prescription claim finasteride 1 mg male pattern baldness study period
